name: FirahFabe
intro: Hi! I'm Fabian, a Filipino-American based in Honolulu, Hawaiʻi. I'm an audio software developer, technical sound designer, game composer, and recording musician. I go by FirahFabe as my music alias.
about: I studied music at University of Hawaiʻi. My software development background is from Flatiron School. I also studied game audio from the School of Video Game Audio and game development from Indie Game Academy.
